text: "You Really Got Me" is a 1964 song by British band The Kinks and was taken from their debut studio album Kinks. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom, number 2 in Australia, number 6 in Ireland, number 8 in Sweden, number 4 in Canada and number 7 in the United States. It was covered by Van Halen in 1978 for their debut studio album Van Halen == References == Category:1964 songs Category:The Kinks songs Category:Van Halen songs Category:Garage rock songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Heavy metal
title: You Really Got Me
